      Goes back to the last registered checkpoint/archive marker If a robot is already there, virtual mode is activated and you will appear the next time you move.
      boolean isRobotInGraveyard​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos)
      Checks if the robot is in positions outside of the maps range or coordinates less than (0,0).

      Creates new win texture at given position.

      • setTextureRegion

        void setTextureRegion​(int robotID)
        Gets texture region from AssetsManager and sets the starting position with this texture.
        Parameters:
        robotID - The id of the position of the cell texture

      • canMoveRobot

        boolean canMoveRobot​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 oldPos,
                     com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 step)
        Checks if it's possible to move robot.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - where the robot comes from
        step - how the robots wants to move relative to itself
        Returns:
        True if its made its move else false if its on the edge of the map.

      • isRobotInGraveyard

        boolean isRobotInGraveyard​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos)
        Checks if the robot is in positions outside of the maps range or coordinates less than (0,0).
        Parameters:
        pos - position
        Returns:
        true or false

      • goToArchiveMarker

        void goToArchiveMarker​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 archiveMarker)
        Goes back to the last registered checkpoint/archive marker If a robot is already there, virtual mode is activated and you will appear the next time you move.
        Parameters:
        pos - position
        archiveMarker - last checkpoint

      • setDirection

        void setDirection​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos,
                  Direction direction)
        Parameters:
        pos - the Position
        direction - The direction the robot is now facing.
